scripts.pm2-restart: npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-start
scripts.desc:
# start: Starts the Express server without PM2.
# pm2-start: Installs and/or updates all dependencies and starts the Node server for spryntax.js
# pm2-stop: Stops the Node server for spryntax.js
# pm2-restart: Restarts the Node server for spryntax.js
# pm2-kill: Stops PM2 (including the Node server for spryntax.js
# pm2-status: Gets the status of current PM2 applications
# pm2-printout: Shows PM2 printouts from spryntax.
